title: Al-Omran
contentLan2: Creating pioneering projects that elevate community living through excellence in design and quality execution, with a commitment to delivering unique and integrated living experiences.
about2: It all began in 1974... where the owners of Al Omran Real Estate Development and Investment Company had distinguished works and significant imprints in the field of real estate investment and development through the implementation of many residential, commercial and tourism projects not only within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia but also extending to include various countries of the Middle East... With the launch of Vision 2030 and the accompanying issuance of inspiring laws, Al Omran Real Estate Development and Investment Company officially saw the light in 2021 to continue the bright path of its founders... After the liberation of the motherland, Syria, Al Omran was the first to be present in the real estate investment and development market as one of the companies of Al Omran Holding Group, putting the experience of the company’s owners, which extended for more than forty years, in the service of the country and its people.
vision1: To be the nation’s leading real estate developer in creating upscale communities that reflect a distinguished lifestyle and exceptional quality.
mission1: To develop pioneering projects that enhance community living through excellence in design and quality execution, with a commitment to delivering unique and integrated living experiences.
dest4: A residential community that enhances the quality of life
serv1: Our strategy encompasses all aspects of the real estate sector as outlined in the regulatory and legislative frameworks related to the industry. It focuses on future cities, urban development, smart cities, and sustainability, aiming to enhance the quality and safety of construction technologies as well as the quality of life in real estate development financing.
contact2: Or just reach out manually to
footer1: From untouched land to thriving life, we don't just build places, we shape stories.
footer8: Register your interest and share your opinion by filling out the survey, to ensure that the project reflects the aspirations of the local community and the needs of customers.
